scripts.docker:login-staging: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 --profile staging | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $AWS_ACCOUNT_STAGING.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com
scripts.docker:push-staging: npm run docker:login-staging && docker push $AWS_ACCOUNT_STAGING.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/wormholescan-bff:$(npm run version --silent)
scripts.docker:build-push-staging: npm run docker:build-staging && npm run docker:push-staging
scripts.docker:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 --profile prod | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $AWS_ACCOUNT_PRODUCTION.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com
scripts.docker:push: npm run docker:login && docker push $AWS_ACCOUNT_PRODUCTION.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/wormholescan-bff:$(npm run version --silent)
scripts.docker:build-push: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push
